=== News ===

* The FloridaTeam <nowiki>[[http://wrevolution.org/index.php/2008/02/12/florida-linux-show/|exhibited]]</nowiki> at the <nowiki>[[FloridaTeam-Projects-FloridaLinuxShow|Floirda Linux Show]]</nowiki> on February 11^th^.  

 There was a F2F meeting the night before the show to engage socially.  Members of both the FloridaTeam and <nowiki>[[GeorgiaUSTeam]]</nowiki> met up the night before in a show of LoCo bonding.  Many, many CDs were given out particularly Edubuntu CDs.  The FloridaTeam was very busy at the show advocating the use of Ubuntu, Edubuntu, Kubuntu, Server and Xubuntu and capped the night off with a dinner with the Jon "Maddog" Hall.  

=== Projects ===

* The FloridaTeam is currently planning to <nowiki>[[FloridaTeam-Projects-HardyReleaseParty|Party Hardy]]</nowiki> on the day Hardy 

 is released.  More to come...

* <nowiki>[[FloridaTeam-Projects-WebSite|Ubuntu-Florida Website]]</nowiki> coming soon! DanTrevino <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/eyes.png]]</nowiki> and ReyAngles are still hard at work getting it ready.  And it is looking great so far.
